item.title: AKoM - All Kinds of Materials (2015) by Patrick Housen
item.description:
AKoM - All Kinds of Materials (2015) by Patrick Housen

Wouter Versavel (20 ♂ Keerbergen (BE)) - Saxophone Sam Van lent (24 ♂ Ghent (BE)) - Saxophone Freya Bovijn (23 ♀ Ghent (BE)) - Bass Clarinet Helena Faes (21 ♀ Ghent (BE)) - Cello Annefleur Roels (22 ♀ Ghent (BE)) - Keys Benjamin Poppe (22 ♂ Zele (BE)) - Trombone

item.title: A Disney space station? It no longer seems like such a goofy idea
item.description:
A Disney space station? It no longer seems like such a goofy idea

Throughout our planet's space-faring history, there have been two major impediments to putting a lot of private citizens into orbit. Only governments have had spacecraft, and there have been only a few, government-controlled, space stations to visit. But now that may finally changing in a big way.

item.title: High Velocity Aerial Filming
item.description:
High Velocity Aerial Filming

Aerial Filming took a giant leap forward when Blue Sky and Peter Degerfeldt challenged Gyro-stabilized Systems in Grass Valley, US, to build a GSS 520 5 axis system that would produce rock solid images at a speed of more than 300 knots per hour.
